_INSTRUCTIONS: Copy COMPLETE Line Companion text verbatim into 'full_text' - no summarization, no trimming

lines.full_text:
All first lines speak for the nature of the hexagram. Warning is the basis of the 21 and its control. "Don't interfere! Attention." The use of force as a last resort. In other words, in the use of power to be in control, the worst thing is to start with force first. I learned this many years ago as a teacher. In public teaching institutions, there were always those teachers who can never, ever control their students. They will threaten them. When that does not work, they will use force and the moment you use force, you cannot go any further. The moment that I had a teacher that would strap and punish me, I knew that I had taken them to their limitation. What else could they do? Kill me?

Warning. The use of force as a last resort. It does not say that you don't use force. If you keep on saying, "Hey, look, this is what you have to do," and they still do not listen, then you can use force.

Mars exalted. The fierceness to be respected without recourse to action. This is an overview line. It takes a long time to get that respect. It is not that you have it right away. This is a deeply painful gate to have if you are a child. You are here to be in control but you are being dictated by your parents, your school, by your siblings, by friends. What usually happens is that these people live with nothing but tension. The cross of Tension is rooted in the polarity between the 21 and the 48. The 21st gate can bring an enormous tension which becomes a strain on the heart, simply because these people are not allowed to be in control.

The Moon in detriment. An inherent peacefulness that all too often turns a necessary warning into a plea. In the white book: The willpower and ego to ensure respect; or A lack of willpower that is forced to ask for respect. These are the 21's who say, "Look, please let me be in control. I know what I am doing. Please stop interfering. Please." That is not a very powerful way of dealing with things. In that moment, the 21 is asking for the other not to interfere when, in fact, they are here to insist that there is no interference.

This is the great dilemma of the 21. That dilemma is written in the genetic continuity of the chart. The 21 in an undefined heart center is dependent on the other person as to whether they can bring out their control or not and they may have to ask. When it is defined to the throat, it is a different process but always, the dilemma for the 21 is to find a way to get the respect so that they are not interfered with. They cannot get that until they learn how to control things. If you have a child with the 21, give them responsibilities. Give them things that they control (their schedule or whatever) so they learn what it is to be in control and they get respect for their ability to be in control of things.

The second line is called Might is right and it has Neptune in detriment, which means that this side is not operating in our time.

It is an overview line: The legitimacy of action in response to flagrant and persistent interference. Remember, to be in control means that you don't deal with any kind of interference because it will show that you are not really in control. This is the ego, after all. You release that control when you are constantly being interfered with; that is the moment that you have to stop the interference.

Think about the second line, which does not know any of that. It does not even realize that it is being in control. Because it does not have that realization (lower trigram, not transpersonal), it is simply in its own thing and then somebody comes along and, because they can look in the window, they say, "These people are being in control of that. I will interfere with that." Boy, do they get a surprise!

What comes out immediately is Mars exalted; there is no detriment. Powerful and extreme reaction. Here, the severest action will be the most successful. You see somebody sitting at a desk and they are doing something. They are in control of what they are doing and somebody comes up to them and says, "You really shouldn't." The legitimate rejection of interference on the material plane. This can be very shocking to people.

The third line is a line that is often totally misunderstood and misinterpreted. Whenever I meet 21.3's, I do the best I can to correct them immediately about the nature of what this line is. Because of the keynote, Powerlessness, there is a false assumption connected to this. This is not about being without power. This is about the possibility of being powerless.

An overview line, trial and error: Where the just are condemned to a futile confrontation with superior forces. This is the way logic works: if you break down what this sentence is actually saying, it says that the just are condemned to a futile confrontation with superior forces, not with inferior forces. When somebody has the 21.3, they can never ever work for somebody else. It is hard for 21's to work for anybody else anyway and I always tell 21's the same thing: you have to be your own boss and if that means that you have to work in a corporation, then you have a separate contract which states that you are an outsider that is contracted in so you can be in control of your material life and not be dependent.

What happens to these people in their trial and error process is that, for example, they try to get into a corporation and they get in at a lower level. These 21.3's go through hell with that because every step and layer above them, every layer of management and control that is above them, is absolutely infuriating to them because they can't win. They don't have the juice. They can't win. They are powerless. The moment that you give a 21.3 a boss, they are powerless. This leads to a lot of difficulties.

There is an advantage to that. The Neptunian field is not at work. The advantage is because this exalted is Defeat as a survivable humiliation, often acceptable through the abuse of drugs and alcohol. This is not active, what is active is: Total withdrawal. Think about what that means in our society.

In the white book you can see that it is: A lack of will for the material path in order to protect the ego. These are people that do not want to work, do not want to leave school. These are people that do not want to have a boss, that want to reject the whole material plane because, in their life, it is impossible to have somebody controlling them and telling them what to do. So, when you meet a 21.3 and you are dealing with this energy, you must tell them that there is only one thing that can help them: never, ever have a boss.

Again, the dilemma of being an ego-child: ego children, like emotional children, have enormous problems in their early years because they have to deal with authority. Particularly, 21 children constantly have to deal with authority. A 21.3 child can be made to feel like they have no power at all and that futility can be a deep pain in their life and they will just withdraw. They will just hide so that they do not have to listen to somebody controlling them.

It is very important to recognize that 21 children have to be treated with respect. They have to. They have to be given their opportunity to show that they are capable of being in control even when they are very young, however you work that out because, otherwise, this powerlessness is conditioning them from the very start and they never get to flower at all.

So many 21.3's that I meet are so angry at the world, so uncomfortable with having been directed all of their lives. For them it is so easy: do not have a boss. Do not have a boss in your relationships; do not have a boss at work. Do not have a superior force in your life, unless you are a masochist and you love to be powerless. By the way, the punks came with this genetic theme.

Regarding their approach to the material plane: this line does not mean that the 21.3 has to withdraw. Remember the overview of the line which says that the futile confrontation is only with superior forces. There is no need to withdraw if they are not dealing with superior forces. The moment they go out and try to deal with superior forces, automatically, all 21.3's will withdraw. They will have a very hard time on the material plane.

The advantage we can give them in letting them know what that line means for them is to understand that if they give up trying to work for somebody (again that takes ego courage), then that withdrawal is not active for them. It will only be active if they meet a superior force because then they will be in a futile position.

When you come to the upper trigram, particularly in the 21st gate, you are dealing with something very different: the capacity to bring control to the transpersonal experience. The fourth and fifth lines are extremely well equipped in the 21 to be able to control what they have to control, which is manifestation. Everything about the tribe is desperate to get to the throat. For the tribe, there is only one way: the 21/45. The throat itself is dependent on having that ego do the work, do the serving. The only way the throat gets that is by protecting the 21. 21's seek out their protectors because they need to find access to manifestation, and that is their gift. Their gift is that they have the ability to transpersonally see how to get things manifested. 21.4's and 21.5's make very powerful leaders, good presidents of companies. The fourth line is called Strategy.

Overview line: Careful appraisal of opposing forces to establish a proper response. This is not simply recognizing that one has the capacity to be in control and the ego that says, "I have to be in control." This is an ego that says, "Wait a second. How do I exercise my control?" In other words, this is an aspect that works the strategy for getting to manifestation. You have to control some people tightly if you are a 21. Some others have to be given space. It varies. The question of what kind of control to use, who to control and when to control, becomes a transpersonal strategy.

We have Jupiter exalted. Success in action through clarity, which means control as the result of investigation: looking at things and seeing how they can be done. But remember, this is a one-tracked process, so strategy is everything. These are very strategic people and they are often accused of being deeply manipulative because they know how to control. Because they are in control-positions, people rarely accuse them of that because they tend to be dependent on their manipulation to have what they need in this life.

Earth in detriment. A tendency, when in the right, to misjudge the power of one's opponents. This is always a dilemma for the ego: just because it is right does not mean that it is going to work. Here in the fourth line, just because you have the right strategy does not mean that it is going to work. There are a lot of businesses everywhere in the world that design strategies every year of how they will make millions. Yes, strategies are nice, but they do not always work.

In the white book: The ego to succeed on the material plane and the instinct to use willpower effectively in response to conditions. This is the gift of being able to see where you use your control. The Earth detriment. The drive when in the right to follow one's ego rather than one's instincts. This is the ego saying, "This is my strategy. I made it up and I will not give it up. It will work," even though you know that it will crash.

The 'opposing forces' are forces which interfere. In this line, it does not matter whether they are inferior or superior. Only the third line is particularly about superior forces. The third line is the pathway that leads to wisdom. For any 21, the third line is really saying: look, if you really understand that you do not have to be powerless, you become the superior force. That is where the real wisdom of the 21 lies, when it recognizes that it is the superior force. The moment a 21 recognizes this, it does not have to claim it anymore. It will get the natural respect that is due because it does recognize that it is the superior force.

This is a classic fifth line and even more so because of the impact of not having Pluto being active, so there is no detriment in this particular line in our time. All fifth lines get projected on. They get projected on because that projection is the desire, the need of passion of the totality to have that kind of a role displayed out of that hexagram. So, society as a whole is looking to the 21.5 and saying, "They should be in control." It is projected on them positively and negatively that they should be in control. Obviously, like any fifth line, they can take that opportunity.

One has to learn how to use power. Because power does not belong to us, it is something you have to learn to work with, to learn how to use.

In the white book: The balanced ego... (But it will start off imbalanced, please understand that.) ...whose willpower is applied objectively. We very much need these people in the world and, because this is a time that we do not have Pluto here, we have a whole generation, day by day, year by year for many years now, that is coming into the world with the possibility of being purely objective, as our controlling agents. The whole world is controlled by 21's. That is part of the global vibration. That is part of the role of the 21. Let's do our best to nurture the 21.5s. If you project onto the 21.5 child that it has to be in control, make sure that you teach that child the importance of being impartial and nonpersonal in its control, in its use of power, because ultimately, these are the beings that are going to apply those controls to the rest of the world.

When you think about it, all the 10th gates together condition our behavior in the world. All the 2nd gates together condition our direction in the world. All the 21st gates condition whether or not our societies and cultures are going to operate properly. It is essential for us that we learn to recognize these qualities in our children and to see very clearly that 21 children must be nurtured so that they end up being productive controlling agents rather than embittered ones, rather than being forced to withdraw, their egos shattered, feeling inferior and not wanting to be involved in controlling. If all the 21's give up being in control, we are going to have what the sixth line predicts: nothing but chaos.

The thing to recognize about the nature of the materialism that is inherent in the 21 is that, built into the most materialistic channel is also anti-materialism, which we already met in the third line: the powerlessness that becomes a lack of will for the material plane because of the ego. That manifests differently. For example, people saying that money is bad, that everybody should share. A good hippie consciousness can come out of the 21.3. The same thing is true for the sixth line. Because sixth lines, in and of themselves, are transitional, they are going to sit above in their aloofness and look out on things. A 21.6 is not very likely to be material and, when they are young, they get involved with it and they discover that it can be disastrous for them.

Chaos. Where ineffective action leads to disorder. The moment that you see a line like that and you are dealing with a sixth line, you really know that this line is going to spend most of its life judging whether something could be an effective action or not. "Well, I don't know if I should really take control because I don't know if it is really going to work and I don't know if I'll really get what I want to get and I don't know whether I will be interfered with and I'll have all these problems." They learn that very early because a 21.6 is like a bull in a china shop. They will go in there and, all of a sudden, everything is flying and they never go into that shop again after that. "Why should I go in there? If I do the wrong thing, everything is going to explode."

The other thing about this line is that the Pluto exalted is not there, so you are dealing with only the Venus in detriment. Withdrawal and reliance on inner order in a chaotic situation. This is the greatest fence sitter of all the sixth lines. The 21.6 sits there on that fence and it does not want to do anything else other than sitting on that fence because it knows that if it steps off that fence, the possibility is that nothing will result of it but chaos.

In the white book: Where the material direction is chaotic, the ego will withdraw and use its power to find an inner order. But the moment a 21.6 knows what material path is for it and is in control of that material path, you have somebody who can be an enormous success. Sixth lines have this inherent capacity to be wise and fulfilled. It is like the 59.6 who will have a lot of quick relationships when it is young and then give up; but if it finds the right relationship, it will display a quality of intimacy that we call soul mate, that can be absolutely beautiful and it will spend day after day with its partner for the rest of its life. In other words, there is the potential in the sixth line for quite a transition experience, something that is really beyond the capacity of the hexagram. However, this is not a very good age for that because the 21.6 goes to the 51.1.

The reality is that the 21 and the 51 are next to each other, so that you have these two very expressive gates of the ego system: one going the material way and one going the initiative and potentially mystical way. When the 21.6 is sitting at its point on its roof and it is staring out, it stares into the 51 which does not have the Pluto exalted. It stares into the 51 in which withdrawal is something that is absolutely necessary after a shock. So the reality is that this sixth line, which is rooted in withdrawal, is looking for an inner order that is compounded by the fact that it is moving towards withdrawal. In other words, one of the things that happens to a 21.6 in our time is that they want to be 51's. Instead of the 21.6 ending up pursuing the material path, they are going to look for the spiritual way and are trying to find wealth in another way. Many of them end up being spiritual business people and end up making their living by selling inner order. That is always a possibility for them.

But it is a very long process for the 21.6 to find their way. It is going to take time in their life before something is really of value to them to be in control of because the thing for them is that it has to be able to come out in the action. If it can't, it is not worth doing.

The actions have to be correct; otherwise there is nothing but chaos. The actions can only be correct if the material path is correct. The 21.6 is not just looking to be in control, it has to be in control of the right thing. The fact that it looks inward is actually an advantage because, from its point of view, it is there to control. If they stay long enough and they watch the movie, they might find the material direction that is correct for them. When chaos happens, the direction was not correct. The inner order was not right. The actions were ineffective.
